opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 24th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, Application for Relief, Application to Expedite, and Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communication are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
